sub_title: Business Partner Human Resources at Zoho Corporation
summary:
Experienced HR/TA professional and Executive Search Consultant with a demonstrated history of working in the International/EMEA/Global level. Bachelor of Laws (LL. B.) holder. 

✓ 360' Recruitment; Intakes, Interviewing, Feedback Sessions, Offer Negotiations, Employment Contracting
✓ Employee Branding and Recruitment Marketing
✓ Candidate Sourcing/Headhunting 
✓ Employee Benefits, Training and Labor Relations
✓ Establishing and Optimizing Recruitment Strategies/Policies
✓ Developing framework and policy for transfers, referrals, promotions, internal hiring or reassignments
✓ Onboarding Planning

awards.title: CandE (Candidate Experience) Award - 2022
awards.description:
Talent Board, a non-profit organization focused on the promotion and benchmark research of a quality candidate experience, congratulates the winners of the 2022 EMEA Candidate Experience (CandE) Awards, our second year doing research in this region.

This year the winners provide thousands of job candidates an exemplary candidate experience as rated by the candidates themselves across these four key data points:

A very positive overall candidate experience rating
An extremely likely to apply again candidate rating
An extremely likely to refer others candidate rating
And the fact that candidates said they were willing to increase their business relationship with the employer via applying again, referring others and making purchases when applicable

awards.title: Queen's Award for Enterprise in International Trade
awards.description: The Queen's Awards for Enterprise is an awards programme for British businesses and other organizations who excel at international trade, innovation or sustainable development. They are the highest official UK awards for British businesses.
awards.issuer: Her Majesty the Queen Elizabeth II

awards.title: Honor by the Dean of the Democritus University of Thrace
awards.description: Honorary award given by the Dean of the Democritus University of Thrace for the international success in the European Human Rights Moot Court Competition.

awards.title: Best written submission award.
awards.description: Award given by the Council of Europe in cooperation with European Law Students' Association for the best written submission (European Human Rights Moot Court Competition).
awards.issuer: Council of Europe and European Law Students' Association

awards.title: Scholarship by Democritus University of Thrace
awards.description: Scholarship (fully-funded transition and participation) by Democritus University of Thrace to take part in the international competition known as: European Human Rights Moot Court Competition, held in the European Court Of Human Rights (Strasbourg).

awards.title: OTE-COSMOTE Scholarship awarded for notably academic performance
awards.description: A scholarship (mainly a grant) given to students for academic success.

profile_positions.description:
Zoho offers beautifully smart software to help grow every business. With over 90 million users worldwide, Zoho's 55+ products aid your sales and marketing, support and collaboration, finance, and recruitment needs—letting you focus only on your business. 

For more than 25 years, we've been committed to helping businesses run better, improving the lives of our employees, and growing the communities we call home. We can't wait to see what the next 25 years will bring. 

Zoho Corporation is a privately-held and profitable company headquartered in Austin, Texas with international headquarters in Chennai, India and offices across the globe.

25+ years of running a business have taught us many things. One of which is: long-term investment in people, results in long-term commitment. We’re humbled by many of our colleagues who have chosen to stay with us for over a decade.

We know that finding a meaningful and rewarding career can be a long journey. Our goal is to make that process easy for you and to create a work environment that's enriching—one that you'll look forward to everyday.

Let's start the journey together, today, from here : 
https://www.zoho.com/careers/?ireft=nhome&src=aboutus-dd
profile_positions.title: Business Partner Human Resources (Talent Acquisition & Compliance)

profile_positions.description:
Foot Locker, Inc. leads the celebration of sneaker and youth culture around the globe through a portfolio of brands including Foot Locker, Kids Foot Locker, Champs Sports, Eastbay, Footaction, and Sidestep. 

With approximately 2,900 retail stores in 27 countries across North America, Europe, Asia, Australia and New Zealand, as well as websites and mobile apps, the Company's purpose is to inspire and empower youth culture around the world, by fueling a shared passion for self-expression and creating unrivaled experiences at the heart of the global sneaker community. 

Our purpose is to inspire and empower youth culture. With our customers at the center of our vision, we are committed to fueling a shared passion for self-expression, creating unrivaled lifestyle experiences for our customers and being at the heart of the sport and sneaker communities.
profile_positions.title: EMEA Human Resources - Corporate Talent Acquisition II

profile_positions.description:
Haybury are an Executive Search Consultancy who are committed to providing solutions and creating opportunities through innovation and collaboration.

We focus solely within Life Sciences, locally and globally and our clients include Pharmaceutical companies, Biotechnology and Clinical Research Organisations, Medical Device companies and Consultancies.

Haybury have a strong and dedicated team with knowledge of the market as well as local knowledge of cities and the areas near you.

Our roles are predominantly mid to senior level positions and we cover positions in all specialisms and disciplines within the pharmaceutical lifecycle.

We offer a broad range of recruitment and talent services to provide excellent personnel strategies and consistently deliver important success.

If you want to contact me please call +44 (0) 1273 727 930 or email me on foteinos.gaitanakis@hayburysearch.com

volunteer_experiences.description: The World Association of Guides and Scouts is a global association supporting the Guiding and Scouting organizations in 150 countries. It was established in 1928 in Parád, Hungary, and has its headquarters in London, England

Acceptance of children and youths regardless of origin, nationality, religion, social and financial status or physical handicap. All members should be willing to accept the Guide Promise
Respect to the cultural identity and everyone’s right to be different
Attendance, participation and work at our meetings are based on everyone’s voluntary service and out of everyone’s personal wish
Encouragement of friendly cooperation among children and adults is essential as well as equal allocation of duties to both men and women
The Greek Guiding Association is a non-governmental organization and doesn’t adopt a party line whatsoever.

Guiding is meaningful play.  Children and young members (aged between 5 and 17 years) learn to live by adopting values such as respect, faith, cooperation and friendship. They participate in modern activities which allow them to experience a carefully designed system of self-management and personal progress and improvement.
